entry.title: Upcoming Transaction Priority Changes
entry.summary: On November 12, 2015, Matt Corallo wrote a message on bitcoin-dev regarding the mempool limiting feature in git master. He stated that high-priority relay is disabled when the mempools are full and discussed taking certain measures for version 0.12. These measures included using starting priority for mining code for ease of implementation, and setting the default block priority size to 0. However, Luke-Jr disagreed with changing defaults and influencing miner policy.
